info.name: Tutti Frutti
info.attribution:
The room layout and game design is by LawDawg96 and released to the Public Domain by CC0. The basket background is available under the Pixabay License from https://pixabay.com/photos/basket-rattan-wicker-chair-template-433796/. The fruit images are CC BY 3.0 from Game Developer Studio available at https://opengameart.org/content/fruit-icons-redo. The yogurt, spoon, and ice cream images are CC0 and available at: - https://publicdomainvectors.org/en/free-clipart/Vector-illustration-of-yogurt-cup/24664.html - https://publicdomainvectors.org/en/free-clipart/Metallic-spoon/50510.html - https://publicdomainvectors.org/en/free-clipart/Color-vector-image-of-three-ice-cream-scoops-in-a-cone/5813.html Card back created at https://pattern.monster/leaves-9/ under MIT License available at https://github.com/catchspider2002/svelte-svg-patterns.

Library image generated using the Midjourney artificial intelligence image generator, https://www.midjourney.com/home/, using the following prompt: "tutti frutti watercolor painting --ar 1:1 --v 5.1"
info.description: Players choose a card from their hand to play face up, then pass the remaining cards. Repeat until all cards are played. Earn points by collecting sets of cards or being player with most of certain card. Most points after 3 rounds wins.

widthRoutine: var rightX = ${PROPERTY x OF $callID} + ${PROPERTY width OF $callID}

fields.text: You are about to reset the game.  Are you sure?
You are about to end the game. If manually scoring, the ice cream cards will be moved to their holders if you have not already done so. Are you sure?

You are about to start the next round. This will recall the cards and deal new cards. If manually scoring, the ice cream cards will be moved to their holders if you have not already done so. Are you sure?
Player must leave Seat 5.  After leaving Seat 5, try again.

instructions.text:
1. Players take seats. Must be at least 2 players for game to work.

2. Configure options (icon: person and gear). Autoscoring is on by default. Pass both ways and dummy hand (for 2 player game) are off by default.

3. Press play button (icon: play arrow). Each player can sort cards using a default ranking by pressing the sort button (icon: stacked horizontal lines).

4. Move selected card to holder by your seat name. Clicking on a card will automatically move it. If using dummy hand, you must manually drag it there. If using automatic scoring, do not reorder cards. Card order is used to determine if the yogurt multiplier is applied to the next berry.

5. When all players have moved a card face down to their holder, press the flip and pass button (icon: card flipping up and arrow pointing up and down). This will flip over the cards so all players can see them. It will also pass the remaining cards to the next player. Cards move down by default and up in round 2 if both ways option is enabled.

6. After all cards are played, the next round button (icon: skip next arrow) or autoscore (icon: scoreboard) button will appear. If manually scoring, enter scores before pressing button. If automatically scoring, press the scoreboard button then the next round button. Ice cream cards will automatically be moved to the far right holder for either scoring method.

7. Game ends after 3 rounds. Ice cream cards will be scored at end of last round if using automatic scoring.
instructions.css: border: 5px double black;border-radius: 5%;background: white; font-size: 22px; padding-right:5px;padding-left:5px

fields.text: You are about to autoscore this round.  This will move the ice cream cards to their holders and change the scores. Are you sure?
